content: You're probably already aware, but IBM in working on supporting arbitrary aliasing graphs in LLVM for use in Fortran. Sounds like there's potential for collaboration. More info: https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/fyi-ibm-is-working-on-llvm-support-for-arbitrary-aliasing-graphs-for-fortran/13278
I was not aware, thanks for the pointer!
